page.title: 19A Typical Family
page.content: My name is Sarah.I am 11 years old and I live in a semi-detached house,in Keadby,which my family owns.My Dad, Rodney,is 43 years old and is a self-employed tarmac contractor.He works from 7.30am-5.00pm.He goes to work in his truck.My Mum,Jill,is 39 years old and works in a beetroot packing factory in West Butterwick.My elder sister,Lynn, goes to Crowle Comprehensive by bus and likes horse riding.She is 14 years old.My younger sister,Julie,is 7 and goes to Althorpe and Keadby School the same as I do.She likes horse riding as well.I like swimming and gymnastics.We have three pets-a 5 year old Alsatian dog called Skip,a hamster called Benny and a goldfish called Chips. On Sunday Dad got up at 8am and had tea and toast before Mum got up.I got up,washed myself and cleaned my teeth.
